Reviews.Title: “Great staff, great location”
Reviews.Author: AndyCatChilliwack
Reviews.Content: dont weird cage elevator youre buzzed hotel reception third floor 4th north american counting dont carry bags floors tad livedin glimpsed couple looked nice fresh son recommended cavour colosseum street facing cavour wasnt noisy theres breakfast modest nice continental breakfast served whatever time choose complete cappuccino prefer nice helpful staff restaurant street terrific
